flatVocabParam.name: fileIds
flatVocabParam.help: Choose the files to appear in your result

sqlQuery.name: FileIdsVocab
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT file_id as internal, file_id as term, filename as display FROM apidb.fileAttributes

sqlQuery.name: file_param_query
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT file_id as internal , 'organism' as ontology_term_name , cast(null as number(10)) as number_value , organism as string_value , cast(null as number(10)) as date_value FROM APIDB.fileAttributes UNION SELECT file_id as internal , 'data_type' as ontology_term_name , cast(null as number(10)) as number_value , data_type as string_value , cast(null as number(10)) as date_value FROM APIDB.fileAttributes UNION SELECT file_id as internal , 'file_format' as ontology_term_name , cast(null as number(10)) as number_value , file_format as string_value , cast(null as number(10)) as date_value FROM APIDB.fileAttributes UNION SELECT file_id as internal , 'build_num' as ontology_term_name , build_num as number_value , '' as string_value , cast(null as number(10)) as date_value FROM APIDB.fileAttributes

sqlQuery.name: OntologyQuery_file_params
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT * from ( SELECT 'data_type' as ontology_term_name , 'Data Type' as display_name , 'string' as type , 0 as is_range , 1 as display_order FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'file_format' as ontology_term_name , 'File Format' as display_name , 'string' as type , 0 as is_range , 2 as display_order FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'organism' as ontology_term_name , 'Organism' as display_name , 'string' as type , 0 as is_range , 3 as display_order from dual UNION SELECT 'build_num' as ontology_term_name , 'Build Number' as display_name , 'Number' as type , 0 as is_range , 4 as display_order FROM DUAL ), (SELECT cast(null as varchar(10)) as parent_ontology_term_name , cast(null as varchar(10)) as description , cast(null as varchar(10)) as units , 1 as precision from dual ) order by display_order
